data.title: Nepali Handwriting Recognition
data.subTitle: Predict the Nepali Alphabets drawn in canvas
data.excerpt: Nepali Handwriting Recognition predicts the nepali Alohabets drawn inside canvas.

content.content: Nepali Handwriting Recognition predicts the nepali letter written inside canvas. We developed this during our internship at Fusemachines Nepal Pvt. Ltd. It is currently hosted on Heroku.
